short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will provide you with the latest news, scores, and updates on the Toronto Maple Leafs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate Chrome Extension for any fan of the Toronto Maple Leafs!

Stay up-to-date with all things Leafs right in your browser. Never miss an upcoming game or previous game score, as you can view these at any time in a New Tab. 

Gain easy access to Leafs top scorer information, which can be viewed by points, goals, assists, or even by defensemen or goaltender wins!

Keep track of the Leafs playoff race at all times with up-to-date standings, which you can view by division, league or conference!

Have the ultimate Leafs experience when you open a new tab, with a variety of Leafs-style Chrome backgrounds, as well as a Leafs-themed scoreboard clock to keep you updated on time and date.

Enjoy the Leafs features while still having a normal Chrome experience, with Google Search available on the page as well.

Enjoy the ultimate Leafs fan experience, right in your browser at all times! Go Leafs Go!

Affiliate Disclosure: Some links within this extension may be affiliate links, which means we may earn a commission if you make a purchase through them. This helps support the development of this extension at no extra cost to you.

If you love this extension, and you'd like to support it's development, consider buying me a Kofi :) https://ko-fi.com/areezvisram
